meta.note: Menu items and prices subject to change. Verify current pricing on Royal Caribbean app before sailing.

150-central-park.name: 150 Central Park

starters: Crispy Berkshire Pork Belly with apple mostarda
Truffle Burrata Caprese with heirloom tomatoes
Duck Confit Salad with orange vinaigrette
Chilled Lobster Cocktail with citrus aioli
Wild Mushroom Soup with truffle oil (TS)
mains: Braised Short Rib with root vegetable purée
Duck Duo — confit leg and seared breast
Wagyu Beef Tenderloin with bone marrow butter
Butter-Poached Lobster Tail with drawn butter

notes: Six different salts served with housemade bread
Menu changes seasonally for peak-fresh ingredients
Reservations strongly recommended — book via Cruise Planner

giovannis-italian-kitchen.name: Giovanni's Italian Kitchen

antipasti: Veal Meatballs in San Marzano tomato sauce
pasta: Lasagna Bolognese — layers of pasta, meat ragù, béchamel
Rigatoni alla Vodka with San Marzano tomatoes
Gnocchi with brown butter and sage
pizza: Margherita — San Marzano, fresh mozzarella, basil
Truffle & Eggs with bacon and white truffle oil
mains: Branzino al Forno — whole roasted sea bass
Veal Piccata with lemon caper sauce

notes: Heart symbols on menu indicate guest favorites
Italian wine list with Sangiovese and Super Tuscan selections

izumi.name: Izumi

signature-rolls: Rainbow Roll — assorted fish over California roll
Crispy Philly Roll — salmon, cream cheese, tempura
chef-rolls: Black & White Roll — shrimp tempura, spicy tuna
bowls: Poke Bowl with fresh fish and rice

notes: Prix fixe includes: 1 small plate + 2 large plates + 1 dessert
Same menu and prices for lunch and dinner
Hibachi experience available on select ships ($59.99-64.99)

wonderland.name: Wonderland Imaginative Cuisine

fire: Smoked Short Rib with ember presentation
sea: Seafood tower with oysters and ceviche
earth: Truffled Eggs served in the shell

notes: Six-course tasting menu using molecular gastronomy
Blank menu reveals itself when painted with water
Servers are 'Wonderland Guards' who explain each dish
Dry ice, edible foam, and unexpected presentations throughout
Alice in Wonderland-inspired décor and experience

sabor.name: Sabor Modern Mexican

starters: Tableside Guacamole — made fresh in molcajete
Spicy Beef Empanadas with tomato-garlic sauce
Fried Chile Calamari with jalapeño mayo and red mole
Ceviche trio — fish, shrimp, and scallop

notes: House-made warm flour and corn tortillas

mason-jar.name: The Mason Jar Southern Restaurant

brunch: Cinnamon Rolls with cream cheese frosting
mains: Low Country Boil — shrimp, corn, sausage, potatoes

notes: All meals include buttermilk biscuits and jalapeño cornbread
Cajun and whipped honey butter served tableside

ben-and-jerrys.name: Ben & Jerry's
notes: Not included in cruise fare or drink packages
Located on Boardwalk (Oasis Class) or Promenade

mdr.name: Main Dining Room

mains: Lobster Tail (formal nights, may have surcharge)

notes: Traditional Dining: Fixed seating time (early or late)
My Time Dining: Flexible seating with reservations
Menu changes nightly with rotating selections
Formal nights feature prime rib and lobster
Special dietary needs accommodated with advance notice

windjammer.name: Windjammer Marketplace
stations: Carving Station — roast beef, turkey, ham
American Grill — burgers, hot dogs, fries
Dessert Station — cakes, pies, cookies, soft-serve

meals.breakfast: Eggs, bacon, sausage, pancakes, waffles, omelets, fresh fruit, pastries, cereals
meals.lunch: Full buffet with carving, grill, international stations

notes: Largest casual dining venue on ship
Self-service with staff at carving stations

chops.name: Chops Grille

starters: Wedge Salad with blue cheese and bacon

notes: All steaks cooked to order on 1800°F broiler

mains: Roasted Duck Breast with cherry sauce

jamies-italian.name: Jamie's Italian

starters: Antipasti Board — cured meats, olives, cheese

notes: Available on Quantum and Anthem class ships

hot-pot.name: Hot Pot
notes: Available on Spectrum of the Seas

portside-bbq.name: Portside BBQ
notes: Available on Symphony of the Seas

fish-and-ships.name: Fish and Ships
items: Classic Fish & Chips — beer-battered cod with fries
notes: Malt vinegar and tartar sauce available

american-icon-grill.name: American Icon Grill
notes: One of three complimentary MDR options on Quantum class

coastal-kitchen.name: Coastal Kitchen
notes: Suite guests only — Grand Suite and above

empire-supper-club.name: Empire Supper Club
notes: Available on Utopia of the Seas

samba-grill.name: Samba Grill
notes: Green/red card system to control service

park-cafe.name: Park Cafe
notes: Famous for Kummelweck roast beef sandwich

playmakers.name: Playmakers Sports Bar & Arcade
notes: Multiple big screens for live sports
A la carte pricing, no cover

sorrentos.name: Sorrento's Pizza
notes: New York-style pizza by the slice

vitality-cafe.name: Vitality Cafe
notes: Some premium items may have charge

latte-tudes.name: Latte-tudes
notes: Located on pool deck or promenade

surfside-eatery.name: Surfside Eatery
stations: Lunch station — burgers, hot dogs, pizza
Kids favorites — chicken nuggets, mac & cheese

adagio-dining-room.name: Adagio Dining Room
notes: One of three Main Dining Rooms on Utopia of the Seas
Formal nights feature prime rib and lobster

aquarius-dining-room.name: Aquarius Dining Room
notes: Main Dining Room on Voyager-class ships
Traditional or My Time Dining available
Menu changes nightly with rotating selections

cascades-dining-room.name: Cascades Dining Room
notes: Main Dining Room on Radiance-class ships

edelweiss-dining-room.name: Edelweiss Dining Room
notes: Main Dining Room on Vision-class ships

minstrel-dining-room.name: Minstrel Dining Room
notes: Main Dining Room on Serenade of the Seas

my-fair-lady-dining-room.name: My Fair Lady Dining Room
notes: Main Dining Room on Navigator of the Seas

reflections-dining-room.name: Reflections Dining Room
notes: Main Dining Room on Brilliance of the Seas

sapphire-dining-room.name: Sapphire Dining Room
notes: Main Dining Room on Allure/Oasis-class ships

great-gatsby-dining-room.name: Great Gatsby Dining Room
notes: Main Dining Room on Independence of the Seas

tides-dining-room.name: Tides Dining Room
notes: Main Dining Room on Liberty of the Seas

pricing.note: Drinks can be included in drink packages

schooner-bar.name: Schooner Bar
notes: Found on most Royal Caribbean ships

pricing.note: Wine not included in standard drink packages
Sparkling wine may be included in premium packages

pig-and-whistle-pub.name: Pig & Whistle Pub
notes: Classic British pub on Oasis-class ships

rising-tide-bar.name: Rising Tide Bar
notes: Unique experience traveling between Royal Promenade and Central Park

pricing.note: Drinks may be complimentary while gaming
Exclusive to Diamond+ Crown & Anchor members

experience: Train journey through Canadian Rockies simulation
